elements.description: Standard Actions
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_2

elements.description:
The actions listed here are standard for all categories.  Many are editing functions
on the index category for the diagram.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_3

elements.description: <icon>identity</icon>  Identity:  Place the identity morphism.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_4

elements.description: <icon>graph</icon>  <diagram name="hdole/graph">Graph</diagram>:  Show the string graphs.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_5

elements.description: This diagram describes the various actions that are available in which types of categories.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_9

elements.description: Actions
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_10

elements.description: <icon>swap</icon>  Swap:  If allowed, swap the morphism's domain and codomain.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_0

elements.description: <icon>action</icon>  <diagram name="hdole/actionAction">Action</diagram>:  Generalize the selected elements to a new action.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_1

elements.description: <icon>referenceMorphism</icon>  Reference Morphism:  The projection or injeciton morphism is designated as a reference.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_6

elements.description: <icon>name</icon>  Name:  Create a named element for the selected element.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_7

elements.description: <icon>composite</icon>  Composite:  Form a composite of appropriately selected morphisms.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_8

elements.description: <icon>detachDomain</icon>  Detach Domain:  Disconnect the morphism's domain from the blob.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_11

elements.description: <icon>detachCodomain</icon>  Detach Codomain:  Disconnect the morphism's codomain from the blob.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_12

elements.description: <icon>homLeft</icon>  Hom Left:  Show the morphisms with the same codomain.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_13

elements.description: <icon>morphismAssembly</icon>  Morphism Assembly:  Build a morphism from a blob using references.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_14

elements.description: <icon>expression</icon>  Expression:  Form an expression from a blob.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_15

elements.description: <icon>copy</icon>  Copy:  Copy the selected elements.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_16

elements.description: <icon>flipName</icon>  Flip Name:  Move the morphism's name to the opposite side.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_17

elements.description: <icon>help</icon>  Help:  Show information regarding the element.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_18

elements.description: <icon>run</icon>  Run:  Evaluate the morphism.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_19

elements.description: <icon>alignHorizontal</icon>  Align Horizontal:  Align elements horizontally.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_20

elements.description: <icon>alignVertical</icon>  Align Vertical:  Align elements vertically.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_21

elements.description: Product Actions
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_22

elements.description: <icon>product</icon>  Product:  Form the product of objects or morphisms.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_23

elements.description: These actions are associated with categories that have products or pullbacks.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_24

elements.description: <icon>project</icon>  Project:  Form projection morphisms from a product object.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_25

elements.description: <icon>productAssembly</icon>  Product Assembly:  Form the product assembly of morphisms with a common domain.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_26

elements.description: <icon>recursion</icon>  Recursion:  Set the recursor for a morphism if the other morphism uses it.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_27

elements.description: <icon>homRight</icon>  Hom Right:  Show the morphisms with the same domain.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_28

elements.description: Coproduct Actions
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_29

elements.description: <icon>coproduct</icon>  Coproduct:  Form the coproduct of objects or morphisms.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_30

elements.description: These actions are associated with categories that have coproducts.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_31

elements.description: <icon>inject</icon>  Inject:  Form injection morphisms to a coproduct object.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_32

elements.description: <icon>coproductAssembly</icon>  Coproduct Assembly:  Form the coproduct assembly of morphisms with a common codomain.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_33

elements.description: <icon>finiteObject</icon>  Finite Object:  With coproducts and a terminal object you get finite objects.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_34

elements.description: <icon>pullback</icon>  Pullback:  Form the pullback of a sink.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_35

elements.description: <icon>pushout</icon>  Pushout:  Form the pushout of a source.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_36

elements.description: <icon>homset</icon>  Homset:  Create a morphism between two objects.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_37

elements.description: Homset Actions
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_38

elements.description: For categories with internal homset, these actions are provided.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_39

elements.description: <icon>evaluate</icon>  Evaluate:  Place an evaluation morphism from an appropriate object.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_40

elements.description: <icon>lambda</icon>  Lambda:  Form a lambda morphism by selecting factors.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_41

elements.description: <icon>delete</icon>  Delete:  Remove the selected elements from the diagram.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_42

elements.description: General Actions
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_43

elements.description: <icon>terminal</icon>  Terminal:  Form the terminal morphism from an object to the terminal object.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_44

elements.description: These actions are available in some categories.
elements.name: hdole/Actions/t_45
